{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Domus Aurea|It|The Domus Aurea}} is the royal palace of the kingdom of [[Remuria]]. It was fashioned from King [[Remus]]'s ship, the [[Fortuna]], and is designed to be a giant instrument on which the Grand Symphony [[Phobos]] can be played. It is considered the "heart" of Phobos, and is thus protected by its power.<ref>{{Ref/Quest|Gradus ad Capitolium}}</ref></p>}}
